introduction: I'm a computer engineering student at NTNU with a passion for programming and technology. I'm especially interested in systems programming, simulation, and automation, with an ambition of working on autonomous weapons and the use of artificial intelligence in the defense industry.

projects.name: robot
projects.description: Collaborative robotics project using LEGO Mindstorms where we as a team built and programmed a line following rover, with emphasis on teamwork and coordination.

projects.name: portfolio
projects.description: My personal portfolio in the form of a website, built using Astro and hosted on GitHub Pages.
